titles.title: A resolution designating September 6, 2014, as "Everett McKinley Dirksen and Marigold Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/31/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates September 6, 2014, as Everett McKinley Dirksen and Marigold Day.
